main event: An unidentified flying object was observed by an Air Force pilot and a cadet near Hempstead, Texas on 27 September 1952.
interesting points: The object was white and circular, flying at an altitude of about 65,000 feet,It moved erratically at speeds of 600-700 mph,The sighting lasted for 2-3 minutes,Another cadet corroborated the sighting with similar descriptions,The final evaluation suggested it was probably a balloon due to local launches amid the reported sighting times.
